refnamediv.refpurpose: Reports information relating to usage of the region_id property on regions.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para:
Reports information about the usage of the region_id property by regions in a .g file. Its default mode is to report which regions in a .g file are using one or a range of region_id values. If a root object is specified, it will report that result only for the regions in the tree of the root object.
If the U is specified, the reporting is inverted and the command will report the ranges of unused ids rather than the regions using various ids.

listitem.para: Limit reporting to regions in the CSG tree below objname.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: For these examples the geometry file used is the standard ktank.g included with BRL-CAD.

example.title: Report all regions using region ids between 4000 and 7000.

para.literallayout: Region[s] with ident 4001: r23 r25 Region[s] with ident 4050: r24 r26 Region[s] with ident 6001: r210 Region[s] with ident 6002: r212

example.title: Report all regions using region ids between 1000-2000 and 4000-5000.

para.literallayout: Region[s] with ident 1010: r213 Region[s] with ident 1011: r214 Region[s] with ident 4001: r23 r25 Region[s] with ident 4050: r24 r26

example.title: Report all regions using region ids between 1000-2000 and 4000-5000, limiting results to regions in the tank geomtry tree.

para.literallayout: Region[s] with ident 4001: r23 r25 Region[s] with ident 4050: r24 r26

example.title: Report all unused region_id ranges in the database between 1 and 1000.
